Text To Learn More About Our Open House

About Swift Plaza

Our club was founded by business professionals for business professionals, with the core mission to help members build their leadership and public speaking skills.


Originally a corporate club for Wells Fargo team members, we have expanded post-pandemic to becoming a Community Club and are now open to all past, present and future business professionals.


Our core mission remains the same: we want to provide a supportive, safe and positive learning environment in which members are empowered to develop communication and leadership skills. We want to inspire and enable you to becoming confident communicators and leaders, thereby contributing to your personal and professional growth.

Visit Us In-Person

You can find us at Swift Plaza Building A, 1655 Grant St, Concord, CA 94520 in the Willow Room immediately on the left when you enter.

Our Mission

We provide a supportive and positive learning experience in which members are empowered to develop communication and leadership skills, resulting in greater self-confidence and personal growth.
